content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for electrical, plumbing, or HVAC services?
Yeah, I think I need an electrician. My outlets keep sparking.
I’m sorry to hear about your outlets! I can help get that scheduled. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Emma! Can you please provide the address where you need service?
I live at... uh, wait, is it the road? Or the apartment? Uhm, it’s near the park? Sorry, I’m not sure how to tell you.
No worries, Emma! Could you please give me the full street address, including any apartment or unit number, so our technician can find you?
Ummm it’s the building with the blue door. Right across from like, the playground. I think the number is… oh wait. I have to check my mail. Can I send it later?
I’m sorry, the address you provided isn’t complete enough for scheduling. Could you check your mail or another document for the full street address?
It looks like I’m having trouble collecting the correct address. I’ll get a team member to help you finish booking.
reason: Unable to obtain valid address from customer.

content: Is anyone there? Do I need to call instead?
reason: Unable to obtain valid address from customer.

content: Hi Emma, this is Angela from XYZ. Sorry for the delay! Can you check an official document or your phone for your exact street address and send it here? We just want to make sure we find the right place.
Perfect, thank you so much! When would be the best time for our electrician to come by today or tomorrow?
This afternoon if possible. It’s kinda urgent.
Got it! I’ll check our calendar and confirm your booking for this afternoon. We’ll text you shortly with your appointment details. If you need anything else, just let me know!
